Name: Buddinpals - Take One Home With You !!
About the game: WOW! A Buddinpal! Yes, a Buddinpal of your very own. Buddinpals is a story told through an assortment of casual gaming, a virtual pet adventure with a cute race of creatures that eventually shows more depth. Who knows what each day will hold: Fool around with a toy, feed your pet, dress your pet up, do college homework, play hide-and-seek, veg out with an old video game system or just save the world if you feel like it. You'll see the beauty of passion and creativity when you're young - and its bad moments too. A bunch of minigames and 'toys' to enjoy and find Play minigames competitively with 2-4 players locally in Party Mode Unique gaming conventions are made and broken as the story slowly progresses Vaguely nostalgic...or not Might be okay to let your younger children play with parental approval
